bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard Rating Structure for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers
Corrigendum 1 (Corrigendum to IEEE Std C37.04-1999)
IEEE Draft Standard Rating Structure for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers - Corrigendum 1 (Corrigendum to IEEE Std C37.04-1999)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std C37.04-1999/Cor1_DB2, Apr 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This corrigendum corrects technical and other non-editorial errors made during the preparation of C37.04-1999 latest version, third printing 29 November 2005, which covers the rating structure for high-voltage circuit breakers rated over 1000 VAC. This corrigendum includes the corrections made in the errata, as the errata will be removed once this corrigendum is approved.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
